title: Gaia | Living Knowledge Network, Decentralized AI The First AI Phone That Rewards You - Get Early Access Join the Waitlist Products
summary: Gaia is a decentralized ecosystem designed to support AI applications that evolve over time. It offers tools for developers to build and deploy scalable AI models using open-source LLMs and specialized knowledge bases, with features like node deployment and API integration.
availability: In Stock (based on deployments and domains registered)
key_details: A decentralized ecosystem for evolving AI applications
Offers open-source LLMs like Llama 3 70b, Qwen2.5, and DeepSeek R1
Enables scalable deployment with node networks and API endpoints
Supports developers through modular tools and knowledge bases
Includes a growing ecosystem with 703,848 deployments and 3,169 domains registered
